title: Evacuate Venue for Fire Alarm
description: A fire alarm is triggered during an event, requiring a full venue evacuation.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the fire alarm and confirm it is not a false alarm.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms a legitimate alarm via CCTV or staff report.

tasks.description: Activate the emergency announcement system, instructing guests to evacuate calmly.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent plays the pre-recorded evacuation message over the PA system.

tasks.description: Dispatch all staff to their assigned evacuation posts to direct guests.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent issues a command for all staff to proceed to their emergency positions.

tasks.description: Contact the local fire department and provide them with necessary information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calls 911 and informs the fire department of the alarm and the venue's status.
